Desc.entry: Increases the ability of faith groups to have an effective, co-ordinated and recognised means of achieving voice and influence in decision-making within the city and to help ensure that the vast skills and experience of the local faith communities are valued and utilised. The forum supports a network of around 400 faith groups, faith-related agencies and faith-based community projects to engage in the wider life of the city. Has developed formal links with statutory, voluntary and community partners.
